Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3449.name: Ground Slam
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3449.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3449.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3455.name: Demacian Standard
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3455.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3455.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds and grants surrounding allied champions {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d8.name: Caretaker's Shrine
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d8.description: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d8.tooltip:
Bard raises a health shrine that immediately offers {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health, but restores up to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health as it gathers power for 10 seconds. The shrine's effect also grants {{ e1 }}% decaying movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Bard can have up to {{ e3 }} shrines active at once, which remain until visited by an ally champion or crushed by an enemy champion.

Active Shrines: {{ f1 }} / {{ f2 }}

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3280.name: Nether Blade
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3280.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3280.tooltip:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Active: Kassadin charges his Nether Blade, causing his next basic attack to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage and restore {{ e1 }}% of his missing Mana (increases to {{ e4 }}% against champions).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f7.name: Hammer Shock
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f7.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f7.tooltip:
Poppy smashes the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e5 }}% of the enemies' maximum Health as physical damage, and leaving an unstable area.

The area slows enemies inside it by {{ e3 }}% and erupts after {{ e4 }} second, dealing the initial damage again.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3254.name: Devour
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3254.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3254.tooltip:
Devour a target for {{ e1 }}s (half that for enemy champions.) Enemies are dealt {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their maximum health as magic damage (maximum of {{ e2 }} against neutral monsters).

Enemy Champions: Requires 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste to be devoured. While holding an enemy champion, Tahm Kench is slowed by 95%.

Allied Champions: While holding an allied champion, Tahm Kench gains {{ e4 }}% movement speed toward enemy champions.

Minions and Monsters: Reactivate to spit them, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to targets hit.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f331d.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
59f3aff28bf5501e050f331d.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f335f.name: Crystal Slash
59f3aff28bf5501e050f335f.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f335f.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ f1 }} physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Basic attacks against non-structures lower Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds (quadrupled against champions).

59f3b02f8bf5501e050f3761.name: Dark Matter
59f3b02f8bf5501e050f3761.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
59f3b02f8bf5501e050f3761.tooltip:
After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Every 50 stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown by 10% (currently {{ f2.0*100 }}%).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3354.name: Bastion
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3354.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3354.tooltip:
Taric's spells will also cast from a nearby ally protected by Bastion.

Passive: Bastion increases Armor by {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Blesses an ally with Bastion and shields them for {{ e2 }}% of their maximum Health for {{ e3 }} seconds. Bastion lasts on the target until a new one is chosen.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a3.name: Lay Waste
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a3.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a3.tooltip:
Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy.

If the blast hits only a single unit it deals double damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3406.name: Paranoia
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3406.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3406.tooltip:
Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for 4 seconds.

While Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e4.name: Decoy
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e4.description: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e4.tooltip:
Wukong becomes Invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds, leaving behind a decoy that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies near it after {{ e2 }} seconds.

16

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3370.name: Valkyrie
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3370.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3370.tooltip:
Active: Corki flies a short distance, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path.

Special Delivery: Corki flies a great distance, dropping bombs that knock aside enemies and leave a burning trail for 5 seconds. The trail slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% and burns them for {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage per second.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b7.name: Jaws of the Beast
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b7.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b7.tooltip:
Warwick lunges forward and bites his target. While the key is held down, he will attach to the target then leap behind them.

On release, deals {{ a1 }}+{{ a2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of your target's maximum health as magic damage (applies On Hit effects). Heal {{ e3 }}% of damage dealt.

16

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3248.name: Blighted Quiver
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3248.description: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3248.tooltip:
Varus' basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks {{ e4 }} times).

Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the target's maximum Health per stack. Max damage vs. monsters: {{ e5 }} per stack.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3319.name: Permafrost
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3319.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3319.tooltip:
Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions and large monsters.

Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for {{ e1 }} second(s).

16

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d6.name: GNAR!
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d6.description: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d6.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Increases Boomerang Throw's cooldown reduction on catch to {{ e4 }}% and Hyper's Movement Speed bonus to {{ e2 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Knocks nearby enemies in the specified direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and slowing them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemies that hit a wall take {{ e7 }}% damage and are stunned instead of slowed.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3249.name: Hail of Arrows
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3249.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3249.tooltip:
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and reduces healing effects by {{ e4 }}%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c9.name: Reckless Swing
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c9.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c9.tooltip:
Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to his target. This ability's cost is equal to {{ e2 }}% of the total damage dealt, but the cost is refunded if it kills the target.

Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Reckless Swing by 1 second.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32da.name: Noxious Trap
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32da.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32da.tooltip:
Tosses a stored mushroom as a trap that detonates if an enemy steps on it, spreading poison to nearby enemies that slows Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, reveals them and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e9 }} seconds.

Traps last {{ e5 }} minutes and take {{ e4 }} second to arm and stealth. If a thrown trap lands on another trap, it will bounce up to {{ e6 }} Teemos further before planting.

Teemo forages for a mushroom every {{ f1 }} seconds, but he is only big enough to carry 3 at once.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f337e.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
59f3aff28bf5501e050f337e.description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f337e.tooltip:
Active: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and ranged attacks.

The next attack in Cannon Stance reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist by {{ f3 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e2.name: Daisy!
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e2.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e2.tooltip:
Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy for {{ f6 }} seconds. If Daisy attacks the same champion three times in a row, she will create a shockwave knocking enemies up for 1 second (3s cooldown). Daisy has:
  • Health: {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})
    Armor and Magic Resist: {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }})
    Attack Damage: {{ f4 }} (+{{ f3 }})

    • Recast to manually issue orders to Daisy.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3380.name: Crippling Strike
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3380.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3380.tooltip:
Darius's next basic attack deals {{ f1 }} physical damage and slows the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

Crippling Strike refunds its Mana cost and {{ e3 }}% of its cooldown if it kills the target.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f340e.name: Voice of Light
59f3aff28bf5501e050f340e.description: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f340e.tooltip:
Breathes out a blast of pure starfire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The blast will also knock nearby enemies back to Aurelion Sol's Outer Limit.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a9.name: Tides of Blood
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a9.description: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a9.tooltip:
First Cast: Vladimir charges up a reservoir of blood, spending up to {{ e2 }}% of his max Health ({{ f3 }}) to increase this spell's damage. While at full charge, Vladimir is slowed.

Second Cast: Vladimir unleashes a nova of blood at surrounding enemies which deals between {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e0 }} (+{{ f4 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and, at full charge, briefly slows by {{ e9 }}%. Targets hit block a portion of the nova.

Tides of Blood will release automatically if held for more than {{ e7 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d7.name: Cosmic Binding
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d7.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d7.tooltip:
Bard fires an energy bolt, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to one or two enemies. The first target hit will be slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} second(s).

If the bolt hits another enemy or a wall, any enemies hit are stunned for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3300.name: Harsh Lesson
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3300.description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3300.tooltip:
Illaoi leaps at her target on her next basic attack, dealing bonus physical damage equal to {{ f1*100 }}% of their maximum health [{{ e1 }}% + {{ f2*100 }}% per 100 attack damage].

When she strikes, nearby Tentacles will Slam at the target.

Harsh Lesson's bonus damage against monsters is capped at {{ e3 }} damage per hit.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f337f.name: Decimate
59f3aff28bf5501e050f337f.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f337f.tooltip:
After a short delay, Darius swings his axe around himself, striking enemies in its path. Enemies hit by the axe's blade take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Enemies hit by the handle take {{ e6 }}% damage (does not apply Hemorrhage).

Darius heals for {{ e5 }}% of his missing Health per enemy champion hit by the blade (max: {{ e7 }}%).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3405.name: Unspeakable Horror
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3405.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3405.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains massively increased Movement Speed toward terrified enemies.

Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes terrified for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f330e.name: Crescent Guard
59f3aff28bf5501e050f330e.description: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f330e.tooltip:
Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of target's current Health in physical damage and knocks them back (max 600 vs monsters).

For {{ e5 }} seconds after casting this ability, Xin Zhao has increased Awareness and will completely block damage from enemies that are far away. Xin Zhao's attacks and spell casts increase the duration of Awareness by {{ e7 }} seconds each.

The last champion hit by Xin Zhao's basic attacks or Audacious Charge is not knocked back.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33eb.name: Pierce
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33eb.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33eb.tooltip:
Hurl a fast but narrow spear that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Triggers Martial Poise (P), Sentinel (W), and Rend (E).

If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ce.name: Cannon Barrage
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ce.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ce.tooltip:
Signals Gangplank's ship to fire {{ f3 }} waves of cannonballs at an area over {{ e3 }} seconds. Each wave deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Collect Silver Serpents with Parrrley to upgrade in the shop.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33da.name: Tempered Fate
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33da.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33da.tooltip:
Bard sends magical energy arcing to a target location. On impact, all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets in the target area are put in stasis, becoming invincible, untargetable, and unable to act for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Epic monsters are also put into stasis, despite normally being immune to disables.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d0.name: Blood Boil
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d0.description: Nunu invigorates himself and an allied unit by heating their blood, increasing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d0.tooltip:
The heat of Nunu and a target ally's blood rises, increasing Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Nunu targets himself, Blood Boil will try to target the nearest Ally champion.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3284.name: Ricochet
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3284.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3284.tooltip:
Sivir's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks bounce to nearby targets, dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage to the first target and {{ f2 }} physical damage to each subsequent target.

If a given Ricochet attack critically strikes its first target, all subsequent bounces from that attack will also critically strike.

Targets cannot be hit more than once by a given Ricochet attack and on-hit effects are applied only to the first target of each attack.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33fd.name: Help, Pix!
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33fd.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33fd.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for {{ e1 }} seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix shields them from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Pix deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants True Sight of them for {{ e6 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3381.name: Apprehend
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3381.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3381.tooltip:
Passive: Darius gains {{ e1 }}% Armor Penetration.

Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3437.name: Decimating Smash
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3437.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.</font>
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3437.tooltip:
Sion charges up a heavy blow for up to 2 seconds. When released, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to enemies hit ({{ e8 }}% damage to minions) and briefly slows them.

If Sion charges for at least 1 second, enemies are knocked up and stunned for 1.25 to 2.25 seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3409.name: Moonfall
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3409.description: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies. Passively grants Diana attack speed after spell casts.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3409.tooltip:
Passive: Increases the attack speed gained from Moonsilver Blade to {{ e3 }}%.

Active: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and then slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3460.name: Drunken Rage
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3460.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3460.tooltip:
Gragas guzzles down his brew, taking {{ e1 }}% reduced damage for {{ e5 }} seconds.

After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals magic damage to nearby enemies equal to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of their max Health (max {{ e4 }} vs monsters).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a5.name: Defile
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a5.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a5.tooltip:
Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana.

Toggle On: Drains {{ cost }} Mana to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.

59f3b02e8bf5501e050f375d.name: Bellows Breath
59f3b02e8bf5501e050f375d.description: Ornn advances unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
59f3b02e8bf5501e050f375d.tooltip:
Ornn stomps forwards unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself for {{ f5 }} (12% max health) for {{ e5 }} seconds. The fire deals up to {{ e0 }}% of the enemy's max health as magic damage (minimum {{ e3 }}).

Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle for {{ f9 }} seconds. The next immobilizing effect against a Brittle enemy has its duration increased by 30% and deals {{ f8 }}% of their max health as magic damage.

16

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b3.name: Switcheroo!
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b3.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b3.tooltip:
Jinx swaps weapons.

Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher: Basic attacks deal 110% Damage to the target and nearby enemies, gain {{ e3 }} range, drain Mana, and scale {{ e5 }}% less with bonus Attack Speed.

Pow-Pow, the Minigun: Basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of {{ f4 }}% (bonus scales with spell rank and Jinx's level). Stacks fall off one at a time and only benefit Jinx's first attack after switching to Rocket Launcher.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3310.name: Ardent Blaze
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3310.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3310.tooltip:
Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds.

When Lucian or his allies damage a marked target, Lucian gains {{ e2 }} Movement Speed for 1 second.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f326e.name: Phoenix Stance
59f3aff18bf5501e050f326e.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f326e.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after burns enemies in front of him, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3451.name: Shadow Dash
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3451.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3451.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage with Shadow Dash or Twilight Assault recovers {{ f1 }} Energy.

Active: Shen dashes in a direction, dealing {{ e2 }} [+{{ f2 }}] physical damage to enemy champions and neutral monsters in his path and taunting them for {{ e1 }} seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3270.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3270.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3270.tooltip:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next {{ e9 }} seconds.

Iron Will: Lee Sin gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Spell Vamp for {{ e8 }} seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f329f.name: Rampage
59f3aff18bf5501e050f329f.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f329f.tooltip:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. ({{ e5 }}% damage to minions)

If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by {{ e3 }} second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to {{ e2 }} times.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c8.name: Vicious Strikes
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c8.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c8.tooltip:
For 6 seconds, Olaf gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and his Attack Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}%.

During this time, Olaf also receives 1% increased healing from all sources for every {{ e3 }}% of Health he is missing.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3416.name: Chaos Storm
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3416.description:
Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity.

Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3416.tooltip:
Viktor conjures a singularity at target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and interrupting enemy channels.

Viktor can redirect the singularity for {{ e3 }} seconds, which will discharge {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every {{ e4 }} seconds to nearby enemies. The singularity will move slower as it attempts to move farther away from Viktor.

Augment - Velocity: Chaos Storm moves {{ e0 }}% faster.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3390.name: Silver Bolts
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3390.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3390.tooltip:
Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum health as true damage (no less than {{ e2 }}).

Silver Bolts deals no more than {{ e3 }} damage against monsters.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3363.name: Winter's Bite
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3363.description:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3363.tooltip:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [2.5% of Braum's Max Health] magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f331f.name: Decisive Strike
59f3aff28bf5501e050f331f.description: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f331f.tooltip:
Garen breaks free from all slows affecting him, and gains {{ e2 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

His next basic attack within {{ e5 }} seconds deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and silences his target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b2.name: Death Lotus
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b2.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b2.tooltip:
Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, rapidly throwing knives at the three nearest enemy champions, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per knife. Total over {{ e3 }} seconds to each enemy: {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage.

Applies Grievous Wounds to all enemies struck, reducing their healing and regeneration by 40%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33dd.name: Equilibrium Strike
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33dd.description: Irelia's attack balances the scales, dealing damage and slowing the target. However, if the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, then the blow stuns the target instead of slowing.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33dd.tooltip:
Irelia pierces her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second(s).

If the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, she stuns them for the duration instead.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3427.name: Command: Attack
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3427.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3427.tooltip:
Orianna commands her Ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum {{ e3 }}%).

Her Ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f343f.name: Alpha Strike
59f3aff28bf5501e050f343f.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f343f.tooltip:
Master Yi teleports to strike up to {{ e8 }} enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage, with an additional {{ e3 }} damage to minions and monsters. During Alpha Strike Master Yi is untargetable.

Alpha Strike can critically strike, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Alpha Strike by {{ e7 }} second.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3314.name: Frenzy
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3314.description: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3314.tooltip:
Passive: Volibear gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to {{ e2 }} times.

Active: When Volibear has {{ e2 }} stacks of Frenzy, he can bite an enemy to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health]) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each {{ e7 }}% Health the target is missing. If Volibear bites a monster, Frenzy's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f341d.name: Spirit Fire
59f3aff28bf5501e050f341d.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f341d.tooltip:
Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at target location, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }}% and are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ec.name: Sentinel
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ec.description:
Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ec.tooltip:
Passive: When Kalista is near her Oathsworn, she gains +{{ f1 }}% Attack Speed. If they both basic attack the same target, she deals {{ e2 }}% of their max health as magic damage. {{ e7 }} second cooldown per target.

Active: Send a soul Sentinel to patrol an unseen area. Champions spotted are revealed for 4 seconds. Sentinels last 3 laps.

Kalista gains a charge of Sentinel every {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3385.name: Spinning Slash
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3385.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3385.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path and generating Fury.

Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by {{ e2 }} second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This reduction is increased to {{ e3 }} seconds against champions.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3391.name: Condemn
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3391.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3391.tooltip:
Fires a bolt that knocks back a target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

If the target collides with terrain, the damage is increased to {{ f1 }} and the target is stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Condemn's damage is increased by {{ e2 }}% if the target collides with terrain.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3396.name: Pyroclasm
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3396.description: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces, up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3396.tooltip:
Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each time it bounces up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow the target by {{ e4 }}%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f341b.name: Siphoning Strike
59f3aff28bf5501e050f341b.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f341b.tooltip:
Nasus's next basic attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e7.name: Ranger's Focus
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e7.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e7.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks grant Focus for {{ e1 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e2 }} times. Stacks fall off one at a time, and at {{ e2 }} stacks, Ranger's Focus can be cast, consuming all Focus.

Active: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Ashe gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed, and her basic attacks fire a flurry of arrows dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage. During this time, she does not stack Focus. Ranger's Focus applies Frost Shot.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3247.name: Piercing Arrow
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3247.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3247.tooltip:
First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage. While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e7 }}%. After {{ e5 }} seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds {{ e4 }}% of its Mana cost.

Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum {{ e9 }}%).

Piercing Arrow's cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if the arrow detonates Blight stacks from at least one enemy champion.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3392.name: Final Hour
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3392.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3392.tooltip:
Vayne gains {{ e1 }} bonus attack damage and improvements to Night Hunter and Tumble for {{ e2 }} seconds. The duration of Final Hour is extended by {{ e5 }} seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within {{ e6 }} seconds.

Night Hunter: Vayne instead gains {{ e4 }} movement speed.
Tumble: Vayne will also gain Invisibility for {{ e3 }} second when she Tumbles.

Stealth - Invisible: Vayne can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
Final Hour's duration can't be increased beyond its original maximum duration.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f329a.name: Hallucinate
59f3aff18bf5501e050f329a.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f329a.tooltip:
Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone. The clone lasts up to 18 seconds and detonates when it dies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes.

  • Mini boxes deal {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage, make enemies flee for {{ e7 }} second(s), and trigger together.

    Clone deals {{ e8 }}% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ e2 }}% increased damage.

    • The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c6.name: Grand Skyfall
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c6.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c6.tooltip:
Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies at the center (down to {{ e6 }}% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1 second.

If Pantheon cancels this channel, Grand Skyfall is put on a {{ e5 }} second cooldown.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ee.name: Blade of the Exile
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ee.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ee.tooltip:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for {{ e4 }} seconds, granting her {{ e5 }}% extra Attack Damage (+{{ f3 }}), increased Range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.

Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much Health they are missing.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f328f.name: Steel Tempest
59f3aff18bf5501e050f328f.description: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f328f.tooltip:
Thrusts forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

On hit, Steel Tempest grants a stack of Gathering Storm for 6 seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, is interruptible by crowd control and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by Attack Speed.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f345d.name: Elastic Slingshot
59f3aff28bf5501e050f345d.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f345d.tooltip:
First cast: Zac faces the cursor and charges up over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Second cast: Launches Zac towards a location, knocking up nearby enemies for {{ f2 }} to {{ f3 }} seconds (based on charge time) and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Zac spawns extra chunks of Goo for each enemy champion hit.

16

59f3aff18bf5501e050f327f.name: Null Sphere
59f3aff18bf5501e050f327f.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f327f.tooltip:
Kassadin fires an orb of void energy that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and interrupts channels.

The excess energy forms around himself, granting a shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c2.name: Hero's Entrance
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c2.description: Galio grants damage reduction to an ally. After a delay Galio smashes down on the ally's original location, knocking up nearby enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c2.tooltip:
Galio designates an allied champion's current position as his landing spot and grants {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }})% damage reduction to that ally until he lands.

When Galio lands, enemies in the area take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds ({{ e2 }} seconds in the center).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3357.name: Dark Sphere
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3357.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3357.tooltip:
Conjures a Dark Sphere dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The sphere remains for {{ f1 }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities.

This spell can be cast while moving.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a7.name: Transfusion
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a7.description: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a7.tooltip:
Vladimir drains the lifeforce of his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health. After casting Transfusion twice, Vladimir gains Crimson Rush the next time it becomes available to cast.

Crimson Rush: Vladimir is briefly hasted and for the next {{ e8 }} seconds Transfusion deals {{ e7 }}% increased damage and heals for an additional {{ f7 }} plus {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f6 }}%) of his missing health (empowered heal has {{ e9 }}% effectiveness against minions).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e6.name: Cyclone
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e6.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e6.tooltip:
Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around for 4 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per second to nearby enemies, knocking them up for {{ e4 }} second the first time they get hit.

At the start, Wukong gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed, and he gains an additional {{ e3 }}% per second over the duration.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3343.name: Blinding Assault
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3343.description: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3343.tooltip:
Valor flies in a line, marking the first enemy he hits as Vulnerable and reducing its vision radius dramatically for {{ e3 }} seconds. He then deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.

If the primary target is not a champion, it cannot attack for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f342f.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342f.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342f.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first enemy hit, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies for {{ e6 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3321.name: Judgment
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3321.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3321.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ f3 }} physical damage to nearby enemies -- {{ e1 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of his attack damage (+{{ f1 }}), {{ f2 }} times (increased by 1 every 3 champion levels) -- over the duration.

Enemy champions hit by {{ e6 }} spins lose {{ e5 }}% of their armor for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Judgment deals {{ e4 }}% increased damage when striking only one enemy.
Cancelling Judgment returns cooldown equal to the remaining duration.
Judgment can critically strike for bonus damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32cf.name: Mystic Shot
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32cf.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1.5 seconds if it strikes an enemy unit.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32cf.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by {{ e2 }} seconds if Mystic Shot hits a target.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3359.name: Scatter the Weak
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3359.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3359.tooltip:
Knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with.

Dark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f1.name: Vorpal Spikes
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f1.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f1.tooltip:
Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f1 }}% of enemies' maximum Health as magic damage and slow by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, decaying over the duration.

Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.
Spikes deal an additional 0.5% of enemies' maximum Health per Feast stack.
Percent Health damage against minions and monsters is capped at {{ e8 }}.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3292.name: Last Breath
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3292.description: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3292.tooltip:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air for an additional 1 second. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For 15 seconds, Yasuo's critical strikes gain {{ e5 }}% Bonus Armor Penetration - this affects Armor from items, buffs, runes and masteries.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f333f.name: Dance of Arrows
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333f.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333f.tooltip:
Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and gains {{ f2 }}% bonus attack speed for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3281.name: Force Pulse
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3281.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3281.tooltip:
Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him.

Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second in a cone in front of him.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33cc.name: Pick A Card
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33cc.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33cc.tooltip:
Cast once to shuffle the deck and again to choose your card, enhancing your next attack.

Blue Card deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and restores {{ e6 }} Mana.

Red Card deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to units around the target and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

Gold Card deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and stuns for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a3.name: Urchin Strike
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a3.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a3.tooltip:
Fizz dashes through his target, dealing {{ a2 }} physical damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. This spell applies on-hit effects.

16

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3267.name: Flamespitter
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3267.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3267.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over {{ e9 }} seconds. This spell deals {{ e4 }}% damage to minions.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals {{ e5 }}% damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ca.name: Ragnarok
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ca.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ca.tooltip:
Passive: Olaf gains {{ e1 }} Armor and {{ e1 }} Magic Resist.

Active: Olaf removes all disables from himself and becomes immune to them for the next {{ e2 }} seconds. Olaf also receives a {{ e5 }}% Movement Speed bonus towards enemy champions for {{ e4 }} second. During this time, Olaf loses the passive portion of Ragnarok and gains {{ e3 }} Attack Damage.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3271.name: Tempest / Cripple
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3271.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3271.tooltip:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next {{ e6 }} seconds.

Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies struck by Tempest for {{ e5 }} seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3333.name: Plasma Fission
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3333.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3333.tooltip:
Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and applies a slow of {{ e5 }}% that decays over {{ e4 }} second(s).

Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle.

Killing a unit with this refunds {{ e2 }}% of the Mana Cost.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f325c.name: Dark Passage
59f3aff18bf5501e050f325c.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f325c.tooltip:
Thresh throws the Lantern to a target location. If an ally clicks on it Thresh will pull both the Lantern and his ally to him.

The Lantern grants a shield lasting {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f6 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near it. The shield amount scales with the number of souls Thresh has collected.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f345b.name: Stretching Strikes
59f3aff28bf5501e050f345b.description: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f345b.tooltip:
Zac's arm stretches and grabs the first enemy it hits, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and briefly slowing them. Zac's next basic attack is replaced with a long range smack that repeats the initial magic damage and slow effect.

If Zac grabs a different enemy with each attack he'll throw them towards each other, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage in an area if they collide.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33bf.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33bf.description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33bf.tooltip:
Kled throws a bear trap that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large monster hit, granting True Sight. Deals 150% damage to minions passed through.

If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for {{ e3 }} seconds, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*2 }}) physical damage, yanks the enemy toward him, and slows the enemy by {{ e5 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Dismounted: Becomes Pocket Pistol, a ranged ability that restores courage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fc.name: Seismic Shove
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fc.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fc.tooltip:
Taliyah targets an area. After a short delay, enemies caught within the area will be pushed and dealt {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

You can control the direction enemies will be pushed by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3287.name: Double Up
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3287.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3287.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot through an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to each target hit. Both apply on-hit effects.

The second shot can critically strike for {{ f1 }}% damage, and it always critically strikes if the first shot kills its target.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f326d.name: Bear Stance
59f3aff18bf5501e050f326d.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f326d.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for {{ e3 }} second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a2.name: Onslaught of Shadows
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a2.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a2.tooltip:
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Hecarim releases a shockwave at the end of his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from him for {{ e2 }} to {{ e3 }} seconds (increases by charge distance).

Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3331.name: Frenzying Taunt
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3331.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3331.tooltip:
Taunt an enemy champion or monster for {{ e1 }} seconds and gain {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for the same duration.

While any of Rammus' other spells are active, Frenzying Taunt's Attack Speed bonus is refreshed.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f345f.name: Barrel Roll
59f3aff28bf5501e050f345f.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f345f.tooltip:
Gragas rolls his cask to a location. When reactivated, or after {{ e4 }} seconds, the cask will explode, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The damage and slow amount increase as the cask ferments, up to {{ e6 }}% after {{ e5 }} seconds. Deals {{ e7 }}% damage to minions.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3316.name: Thunder Claws
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3316.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3316.tooltip:
Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage that chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f343d.name: Hookshot
59f3aff28bf5501e050f343d.description: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f343d.tooltip:
First Cast: Fire a hookshot that attaches to terrain, pulling Camille to it and allowing Hookshot to be recast for 1 second.

Second Cast: Camille leaps from the wall, colliding with the first enemy champion hit. Upon landing, she deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and a {{ e1 }} second stun to nearby enemies. Dashes towards enemy champions travel twice as far and grant {{ e2 }}% attack speed for {{ e5 }} seconds on impact.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32de.name: Summon: Tibbers
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32de.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32de.tooltip:
Summons Tibbers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. For the next 45 seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) per second and attacks for {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) as magic damage. Annie can control Tibbers by reactivating this ability.

Tibbers Enrages when: summoned; Annie uses Pyromania on an enemy Champion; and when Annie dies.

Enrages: Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Movement Speed, decaying over 3 seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ee.name: Fate's Call
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ee.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ee.tooltip:
Draw Kalista's Oathsworn to her. For up to 4 seconds, the Oathsworn is untargetable and pacified.

The Oathsworn may mouse click to fly toward target position, stopping at the first enemy champion hit and knocking all enemies in a small radius back.

Kalista's Oathsworn must be within 1100 units for her to cast this ability.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f336b.name: Arcanopulse
59f3aff28bf5501e050f336b.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f336b.tooltip:
First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range.

Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the Mana cost is refunded.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3371.name: Gatling Gun
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3371.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3371.tooltip:
Corki's gatling gun fires continuously at targets in front of him for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and reducing up to {{ e4 }} armor and magic resist.

Gatling Gun's damage is {{ e7 }}% physical, {{ e8 }}% magic.
Defense reductions last for {{ e6 }} seconds after last being damaged by Gatling Gun.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b3.name: Twin Bite
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b3.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b3.tooltip:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack, dealing {{ f2 }} and {{ f1 }} physical damage on the first and second hits respectively.

While Twin Bite is on cooldown, basic attacks reduce the remaining cooldown duration by {{ e3 }} seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

Twin Bite's second hit damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Shyvana's attack damage.

59f3b0308bf5501e050f3762.name: Stranglethorns
59f3b0308bf5501e050f3762.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
59f3b0308bf5501e050f3762.tooltip:
Summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket at target location which deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area as it expands. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward knocking enemies into the air for {{ e1 }} second.

Garden of Thorns: Plants within the thicket are enraged, attacking in a flurry for 200% total damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3332.name: Tremors
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3332.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3332.tooltip:
Shake the earth for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e6 }} times.

Tremors deals {{ e5 }}% damage to turrets.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f2.name: Shadow Dance
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f2.description: Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike through her target, dealing damage and consuming an Essence of Shadow charge. Akali recharges Essence of Shadow charges periodically, max 3 stacks.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f2.tooltip:
Akali quickly strikes through her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Akali stores an Essence of Shadow on kills and assists as well as every {{ f1 }} seconds up to {{ e4 }} total.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ad.name: Sapling Toss
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ad.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ad.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for {{ f1 }} seconds. Saplings will chase nearby enemies, detonating on proximity, dealing {{ e1 }} +{{ e8 }}% [+{{ a1 }}%] Target Max Health magic damage and slowing enemies struck by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Saplings placed in brush last for {{ f2 }} seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing double damage over {{ e6 }} seconds to all enemies hit.

Maximum {{ e4 }} Damage to non-Champions, doubled for brush.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3441.name: Wuju Style
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3441.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3441.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}) Attack Damage.

Active: Basic attacks deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) bonus true damage for {{ e5 }} seconds. Afterwards the passive bonus is lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3398.name: Smoke Screen
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3398.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range and Movement Speed.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3398.tooltip:
Creates a cloud of Black Smoke lasting 4 seconds. Enemies inside Black Smoke cannot see out.

Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e2 }}% on impact.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ca.name: Shadow Assault
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ca.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ca.tooltip:
Talon disperses a ring of blades that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all units they hit, gains {{ e3 }}% increased movement speed, and becomes Invisible for up to {{ e5 }} seconds. When the Invisibility ends, the blades converge, dealing the same damage again to enemies they pass through.

If Talon cancels Invisibility with an attack or Noxian Diplomacy, the blades converge on his target's location instead.

16

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3415.name: Death Ray
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3415.description:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3415.tooltip:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to every enemy in its path.

Augment - Aftershock: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e1.name: Siphon of Destruction
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e1.description: Mordekaiser deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. For each unit hit, Mordekaiser's shield absorbs energy.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e1.tooltip:
Mordekaiser deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone.

For each Champion hit, he gains {{ e5 }}% maximum shield.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c5.name: Heartseeker Strike
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c5.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c5.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% Health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and delivers {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (deals {{ e2 }}% damage to minions and monsters).

Damage per Strike: {{ f1 }}

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3440.name: Meditate
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3440.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3440.tooltip:
Master Yi channels, restoring {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health per second for 4 seconds. This healing is increased by {{ e4 }}% for every {{ e5 }}% of Master Yi's missing Health.

While channeling, Master Yi reduces incoming damage by {{ e3 }}%. This damage reduction is halved against turrets.

In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b1.name: Shunpo
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b1.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b1.tooltip:
Katarina dashes in the blink of an eye to the target ally, enemy, or Dagger. If it is an enemy, Katarina strikes for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage - otherwise she strikes the nearest enemy in range.

Picking up a Dagger will reduce Shunpo's cooldown by {{ f1 }} seconds ({{ f3*100 }}%).

16

59f3aff18bf5501e050f329b.name: Cull the Meek
59f3aff18bf5501e050f329b.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f329b.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health for each non-champion hit and {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) Health for each champion hit, up to {{ e4 }} Health.

He generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Heal increased to {{ e7 }} (+{{ f4 }}) per non-champion and {{ f5 }} (+{{ f6 }}) per champion, up to {{ e9 }}. No longer generates Fury.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3364.name: Stand Behind Me
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3364.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3364.tooltip:
Braum leaps to target allied champion or minion.

On arrival, Braum and the ally gain {{ f3 }} Armor and {{ f4 }} Magic Resist ({{ e4 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of Braum's bonus Armor/Magic Resist) for {{ e1 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3423.name: Infected Cleaver
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3423.description: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3423.tooltip:
Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing {{ e2 }}% of the target's current health as magic damage (no less than {{ e1 }}) and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

If the cleaver hits, {{ f1 }} health is refunded ({{ f2 }} if the cleaver kills).

Infected Cleaver deals no more than {{ e6 }} damage against monsters.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f325d.name: Flay
59f3aff18bf5501e050f325d.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f325d.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal from {{ f3 }} to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) additional magic damage, which builds up while not attacking (total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% total Attack Damage).

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a line beginning behind Thresh. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} second.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3313.name: Rolling Thunder
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3313.description: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3313.tooltip:
Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. This bonus is enhanced to {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions.

Volibear's next attack during this time deals an additional {{ e1 }} physical damage and flings the target behind him.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f332e.name: Static Field
59f3aff28bf5501e050f332e.description: Passively causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f332e.tooltip:
Passive: Lightning arcs off of Blitzcrank to hit a random nearby enemy for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every 2.5 seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and silences surrounding enemy units for 0.5 seconds. The passive is not in effect during the cooldown.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3403.name: Duskbringer
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3403.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3403.tooltip:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e4 }} Attack Damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f333b.name: Chomp
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333b.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333b.tooltip:
Trundle lunges at his opponent with his next basic attack, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and briefly slowing his target.

This attack increases Trundle's Attack Damage by {{ e3 }} for {{ e6 }} seconds, with his opponent losing half of this amount.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3394.name: Pillar of Flame
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3394.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3394.tooltip:
After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies.

Blaze: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3420.name: Venom Cask
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3420.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3420.tooltip:
Twitch hurls a cask that adds a stack of Deadly Venom to all enemies struck and leaves behind a toxic cloud that persists for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Enemies that remain within the cloud have {{ e2 }}% reduced Movement Speed and receive an additional stack of Deadly Venom each second.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f340d.name: Comet of Legend
59f3aff28bf5501e050f340d.description: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f340d.tooltip:
Passive: Continuously moving in one direction grants increasing Movement Speed up to {{ e2 }}%.

Active: Fly for {{ e3 }} units in the chosen direction. Only castable outside of combat. Aurelion Sol can see and be seen over walls while flying.

Taking champion or turret damage will force a landing and reset the passive movement speed.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3424.name: Burning Agony
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3424.description: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3424.tooltip:
Toggle: Dr. Mundo sets himself on fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies every second.

While on fire, the duration of disables against Dr. Mundo are reduced by {{ e5 }}%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33aa.name: Hemoplague
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33aa.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33aa.tooltip:
Vladimir infects enemies in a target area with a virulent plague, causing them to take {{ e2 }}% increased damage from all sources for {{ e4 }} seconds.
