After {{ e4 }} seconds, Vladimir deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all infected targets. If Hemoplague damages an enemy Champion, Vladimir heals himself for {{ f4 }} (+{{ f3 }}), plus {{ e5 }}% for each Champion beyond the first.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d9.name: Magical Journey
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d9.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d9.tooltip:
Bard opens a one-way corridor through nearby terrain. Both allies and enemies can use the corridor by right-clicking on any part of it while near its entrance, with allies travelling {{ e2 }}% faster than enemies.

The corridor disappears after {{ e1 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3443.name: Overload
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3443.description:
Passively, Ryze's other damaging spells reset Overload and begin to charge a Rune that can be used to empower Overload.

On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If a Rune is fully charged, Ryze also gains a shield and Movement Speed.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3443.tooltip:
Passive: Rune Prison and Spell Flux reset Overload's cooldown and charge a Rune for {{ e2 }} seconds, up to {{ e9 }} Runes.

Active: Unleash a runic blast, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy struck. Any active Runes are discharged.

If {{ e9 }} Runes are discharged, they Overload, shielding Ryze from {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) damage and increasing his Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32cb.name: Parrrley
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32cb.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32cb.tooltip:
Fires a bullet that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (can crit and applies on-hit effects).

If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders {{ e2 }} bonus Gold and {{ e5 }} Silver Serpents. (Trade Silver Serpents at the shop to upgrade Cannon Barrage).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3372.name: Missile Barrage
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3372.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3372.tooltip:
Active: Corki fires a missile that explodes at the first enemy it hits, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies.

Corki can store up to 7 missiles, and every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3346.name: Behind Enemy Lines
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3346.description: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3346.tooltip:
Quinn calls down Valor to assist her. After a 2 second channel, they unite, gaining {{ e3 }}% Total Movement Speed and the ability to cast Skystrike by recasting this ability or taking offensive action. Skystrike damages nearby enemies.

Taking champion or turret damage puts Behind Enemy Lines on a 3 second cooldown.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3456.name: Cataclysm
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3456.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3456.tooltip:
Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Activate again to collapse the terrain.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a0.name: Spirit of Dread
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a0.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a0.tooltip:
Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source.

Hecarim cannot heal more than {{ e4 }} Health from minions or monsters.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f3.name: Dark Flight
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f3.description: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f3.tooltip:
Aatrox takes flight and slams down at target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact for {{ e4 }} second.

Aatrox fills up 20% of the Blood Well upon cast.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f2.name: Feast
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f2.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f2.tooltip:
Ravenously feed on an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) true damage to champions or {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) to minions and monsters. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain {{ e3 }} maximum health.

Only {{ e4 }} total stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic monsters. (Current: {{ f3 }}/{{ e4 }})

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3436.name: Final Spark
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3436.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark kills a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3436.tooltip:
Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. If Final Spark kills an enemy champion, {{ e3 }}% of its cooldown is refunded.

Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3276.name: Eulogy of the Isles
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3276.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3276.tooltip:
Yorick summons The Maiden of the Mist and {{ e1 }} Mist Walkers. The Maiden has {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health, deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage, and raises Mist Walkers from nearby enemy deaths.

When Yorick damages the Maiden's target he will deal {{ e5 }}% of their max Health as bonus magic damage ({{ e7 }} second cooldown).

If the Maiden is summoned inside a lane, she will start pushing the lane.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33af.name: Bouncing Blade
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33af.description: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33af.tooltip:
Katarina throws a Dagger, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the target and {{ e4 }} nearby enemies. The dagger then ricochets onto the ground behind the primary target.

16

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3338.name: Yordle Snap Trap
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3338.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3338.tooltip:
Sets traps that an enemy Champion can spring, immobilizing them for {{ e6 }} seconds and granting True Sight for a short duration.

Traps last for {{ e3 }} seconds. {{ e5 }} traps may be active at once.

Trapped enemies take an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) increased damage from Headshot.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b1.name: Glacial Path
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b1.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b1.tooltip:
Casts an ice claw that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e9.name: Lightning Rush
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e9.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Each enemy unit he touches takes damage and receives a Mark of the Storm.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e9.tooltip:
Kennen doubles his base movement speed and ignores unit collision for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to any enemy he passes through. Additionally, Kennen will gain {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

Kennen gains 40 Energy the first time he passes through an enemy.
Lightning Rush deals half damage to minions.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33db.name: Bladesurge
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33db.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target. If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds a portion of the Mana Cost.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33db.tooltip:
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown is refreshed and Irelia gains {{ e2 }} Mana.

59f3b0308bf5501e050f3764.name: Allure
59f3b0308bf5501e050f3764.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
59f3b0308bf5501e050f3764.tooltip:
Curses target champion or monster for 5 seconds. If Evelynn hits the target with a basic attack or ability, she will expunge the Curse, refund its mana cost, and briefly slow the target by {{ e3 }}%.

If the Curse lasts at least 2.5 seconds, expunging it Charms the target for {{ e2 }} second(s) and:
  • Against champions: shreds Magic Resist by {{ e9 }}% for {{ e0 }} seconds.
    Against monsters: deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Charm duration increased by {{ e1 }} seconds.

    • Casting Allure does not remove Evelynn from Demon Shade.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3410.name: Rampant Growth
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3410.description: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Additionally, Rampant Growth passively grants her plants improved maximum Health.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3410.tooltip:
Plants a seed, lasting {{ e6 }} seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies. Seeds spawned by Rampant Growth grant vision in a small area, and if stepped on they grant True Sight of the enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Zyra stores a seed every {{ ammorechargetime }} seconds (Max: 8 seeds planted).

Passive: Zyra's plants gain {{ e8 }}% extra maximum Health.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3395.name: Conflagration
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3395.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3395.tooltip:
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f345e.name: Let's Bounce!
59f3aff28bf5501e050f345e.description: Zac flattens himself, making him immune to crowd control while slowing enemies standing on top of him. When he decides to bounce away, he will suck up any enemies standing on top of him, taking them for a ride.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f345e.tooltip:
First cast: Zac squishes himself down, making him immune to Crowd Control for up to {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies standing on top of him are slowed by {{ e4 }}%.

Second cast: Charging for at least {{ f1 }} seconds before recasting causes Zac to scoop up enemies on top of him, carrying them towards a location. Upon landing nearby enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are briefly slowed.

Reactivating before Zac charges up knocks back nearby enemies instead.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ef.name: Mark of the Assassin
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ef.description: Akali spins her kama at a target enemy to deal Magic Damage and mark the target for 6 seconds. Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will trigger and consume the mark to cause additional damage and restore Energy.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ef.tooltip:
Akali throws her kama at a target enemy to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and mark the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will consume the mark to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and restore {{ e3 }} energy.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32bd.name: Dark Wind
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32bd.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32bd.tooltip:
Unleashes a Crow at the targeted enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage before bouncing to another target. Units struck are also silenced for {{ e2 }} seconds the first time per cast.

Dark Wind can strike up to {{ e3 }} times and will prioritize enemies being Drained or ones it has not yet hit. Deals {{ e4 }}% damage to minions and monsters.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f331a.name: Glacial Prison
59f3aff28bf5501e050f331a.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f331a.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second.

The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, stunning for {{ e6 }} seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by {{ e8 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a0.name: Deadly Plumage
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a0.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a0.tooltip:
Xayah creates a storm of blades for {{ e2 }} seconds that grant her {{ e1 }}% attack speed and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for {{ e5 }}% damage.

If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, Xayah gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3258.name: Distortion
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3258.description: LeBlanc rapidly dashes to a target location, dealing magic damage to nearby units. In the following 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3258.tooltip:
Dashes to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area.

For the next 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b8.name: Purge
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b8.description: Urgot shields himself, slowing himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b8.tooltip:
For {{ e3 }} seconds, Urgot shoots at a nearby enemy {{ e8 }} times a second, dealing {{ e9 }} (+{{ f3 }}) physical damage per shot, locking onto champions recently damaged by his other abilities. He also shields himself, absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage.

While firing, Urgot loses {{ e5 }} movement speed but has {{ e2 }}% slow resistance and can walk over minions and non-epic monsters.

Applies on-hits at 33% damage. Cannot critically strike. Minimum of {{ e0 }} damage to minions.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3262.name: Mantra
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3262.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3262.tooltip:
Karma empowers her next ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.

Soulflare: Deals bonus damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, slowing enemies and dealing additional damage.

Renewal: Karma heals for a portion of her missing health. If the link is unbroken the root is longer and Karma is healed again.

Defiance: The shield is stronger and allied champions around the target also gain a shield and movement speed.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3302.name: Leap of Faith
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3302.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3302.tooltip:
Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and spawning a Tentacle for each enemy champion hit.

For the next {{ e1 }} seconds Tentacles are untargetable and will Slam 50% faster, and Harsh Lesson has a 2 second cooldown.

'There are kind and gentle gods. Mine isn't one of those.'

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3315.name: Majestic Roar
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3315.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3315.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Minions and monsters are feared as well.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c8.name: Rake
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c8.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c8.tooltip:
Talon tosses a volley of blades, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to units hit and returning to him after a delay.

On their way back to Talon, the blades deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional damage and slow the enemy by {{ e2 }}% for 1 second.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f3.name: Vault Breaker
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f3.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f3.tooltip:
Charges a powerful punch that carries Vi forward.

First Cast: Slows Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% while increasing damage and dash range over 1.25 seconds.

Second Cast: Dashes forward dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ f2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit (deals {{ e3 }}% damage to minions and monsters). Stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking it back.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a1.name: Bladecaller
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a1.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a1.tooltip:
Xayah calls all Feathers back to her, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f4 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through (Increased by Critical Strike Chance).

Hitting an enemy with {{ e5 }} Feathers roots them for {{ e4 }} second.

Minions take {{ e2 }}% damage from Bladecaller.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b6.name: Dragon's Descent
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b6.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b6.tooltip:
Active: Shyvana transforms into a dragon, gaining {{ e0 }} Health and flying to target location. Enemies along her path take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Passive: Shyvana generates {{ e3 }} Fury every second. Basic Attacks generate {{ e2 }} Fury.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d5.name: Hop / Crunch
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d5.description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d5.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Leaps to a location, gaining {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce off it, traveling further. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage and slows briefly if the unit landed on was an enemy.

Mega Gnar: Leaps to a location and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage to nearby enemies on landing. Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are slowed briefly.

If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to bounce.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d3.name: Savagery
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d3.description:
Rengar slashes all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line. Casting this outside the max range moves Rengar a short distance in that direction.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d3.tooltip:
Slash all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage per strike.

Ferocity effect:
Each hit deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage.

If cast outside max range, Rengar lunges forward to extend the range of the piercing attack.
If used during leap, Savagery is cast immediately following the leap.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33fb.name: Glitterlance
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33fb.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33fb.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit and {{ f4 }} (+{{ f5 }}) to all additional enemies. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e3 }} second(s).

An enemy can only be damaged for up to a total of {{ f6 }} damage per cast.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3335.name: Tectonic Disruption
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3335.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3335.tooltip:
Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32bc.name: Drain
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32bc.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32bc.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks creates a tether to the target unit and channels Drain on it, granting True Sight and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to the target. Fiddlesticks heals for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

Drain lasts up to {{ e4 }} seconds, dealing a total of {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage.

16

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3251.name: Fling
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3251.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3251.tooltip:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3373.name: Dredge Line
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3373.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor, the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half, and half the Mana cost is refunded.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3373.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward, the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}), and {{ e4 }}% of the Mana cost is refunded.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33bc.name: Satchel Charge
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33bc.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33bc.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ e2 }} seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Satchel Charge will hexplode structurally unsound towers below {{ f1*100 }}% of their Health.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f328a.name: Bullet Time
59f3aff18bf5501e050f328a.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f328a.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per wave ({{ e2 }} waves total).

Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike for {{ f3 }}% damage.

Total Damage: {{ f2 }}

59f3aff28bf5501e050f334f.name: Decrepify
59f3aff28bf5501e050f334f.description: Swain sends Beatrice to cripple enemies within the target area. Crippled targets are slowed and damaged over time.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f334f.tooltip:
Beatrice lands on the target area for {{ e3 }} seconds and attacks the closest enemy unit prioritizing champions, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and slowing it down by {{ e2 }}%. Damage is doubled to {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage against minions.

Beatrice will look for a new target if the current one moves away or dies. If any nearby enemy unit is afflicted by Torment then it will become Beatrice's target.

Max damage: {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) to non-minions and {{ f4 }} (+{{ f5 }}) to enemy minions.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3309.name: Trample
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3309.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit colision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3309.tooltip:
Alistar tramples the ground, ignoring unit collision and dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages at least one enemy champion grants Alistar a Trample stack.

At {{ e5 }} Trample stacks Alistar empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal an additional {{ f3 }} magic damage and stun for {{ e6 }} second.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3256.name: Abyssal Voyage
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3256.description: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3256.tooltip:
Begin to channel for up to 6 seconds. During this time, one ally champion can right click Tahm Kench to join in. Alternatively, reactivate this ability to travel alone. On reactivation or once an ally has opted in, Tahm travels to the target location. Incoming champion damage breaks the channel.

'Boy, the world's one river, and I'm its king. Ain't no place I ain't been; ain't no place I can't go again.'

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3318.name: Winter's Wrath
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3318.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3318.tooltip:
Sejuani swings her flail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Frost to enemies hit and knocking minions and monsters back.

She then lashes out with her flail, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage, applying Frost and slowing enemies hit briefly.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f331e.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
59f3aff28bf5501e050f331e.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f324b.name: Lunge
59f3aff18bf5501e050f324b.description: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f324b.tooltip:
Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects. This attack prioritizes Vitals and enemies it will kill.

If this ability hits an enemy, {{ e4 }}% of its cooldown is refunded.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3297.name: Deceive
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3297.description: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3297.tooltip:
Shaco teleports nearby and becomes Invisible for {{ e3 }} seconds. Shaco remains Invisible even if he uses Jack in the Box or Hallucinate.

His next basic attack during or shortly after Invisibility will reduce Deceive's cooldown by {{ f3 }} seconds.

16

59f3b0308bf5501e050f3765.name: Whiplash
59f3b0308bf5501e050f3765.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.
59f3b0308bf5501e050f3765.tooltip:
Whip target with Lashers, applying on hit effects and dealing magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e5 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their max health. Then, gain {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Entering Demon Shade resets Whiplash's cooldown and empowers it. When empowered, Whiplash pulls Evelynn to her target, dealing magic damage to them and enemies in the way equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their max health.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f339b.name: Starcall
59f3aff28bf5501e050f339b.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f339b.tooltip:
Calls down a star from Soraka to a target location. Enemies standing in the explosion radius take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

If Starcall hits a champion Soraka gains Rejuvenation for {{ e5 }} seconds, which restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) health per second and grants {{ e9 }}% movement speed when not moving toward enemy champions.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e3.name: Conquering Sands
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e3.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e3.tooltip:
Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a {{ e2 }}% slow for 1 second.

Enemies hit by multiple Sand Soldiers will not take additional damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c0.name: Shield of Durand
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c0.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt nearby enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c0.tooltip:
Passive: After not taking damage for {{ e6 }} seconds Galio gains a shield that absorbs {{ f3 }} magic damage.

First Cast: Galio starts to charge, gaining {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})% Damage Reduction but slowing himself by {{ e3 }}%.

Second Cast: Galio taunts nearby enemy champions for {{ e4 }} to {{ e7 }} seconds and refreshes the Damage Reduction for {{ e8 }} seconds. Taunt duration and radius increase with charge time.

Shield of Durand's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32be.name: Crowstorm
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32be.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32be.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks channels for {{ e3 }} seconds, then blinks to the target point unleashing a murder of crows that flock wildly around him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

The effect lasts for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total magic damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d4.name: Hyper / Wallop
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d4.description:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d4.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Every 3rd attack or spell on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of the target's max Health as magic damage and grants Gnar {{ f1 }}% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds (max {{ e4 }} damage vs. monsters).

Mega Gnar: Stuns enemies in an area for {{ e5 }} seconds, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage.

Gnar gains Hyper's Movement Speed bonus when he leaves Mega form.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3397.name: End of the Line
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3397.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3397.tooltip:
Fires a powder round that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies in a line.

After 2 seconds or {{ e6 }} seconds on collision with terrain, the round detonates, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f8.name: Steadfast Presence
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f8.description: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain movement speed.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32f8.tooltip:
Passive: Poppy gains {{ f1 }} Armor and {{ f2 }} Magic Resist ({{ e3 }}% of Armor and Magic Resist). This bonus is doubled if Poppy is below 40% Health.

Active: For the next {{ e1 }} seconds, Poppy gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed. While Steadfast Presence is active, she stops enemy dashes in an area around her, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ff.name: Tentacle Smash
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ff.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ff.tooltip:
Passive: Slam damage is increased by {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Active: Illaoi swings her idol, causing a Tentacle to Slam forward.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f339c.name: Astral Infusion
59f3aff28bf5501e050f339c.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f339c.tooltip:
Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to another champion ally.

If cast while affected by Rejuvenation, Soraka will grant her target its benefits for {{ f1 }} seconds.

Cannot be cast if Soraka is below 5% Health.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3388.name: Zephyr
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3388.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3388.tooltip:
Passive: While Zephyr is not on cooldown, Janna gains {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) Movement Speed and can move through units.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3382.name: Noxian Guillotine
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3382.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3382.tooltip: Leaps to target enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) true damage. For each stack of Hemorrhage on the target, Noxian Guillotine deals an additional {{ e3 }}% damage.8

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e4.name: Arise!
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e4.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e4.tooltip:
Passive: Azir gains {{ e3 }}% attack speed. When Azir has {{ e6 }} or more Sand Soldiers, he gains {{ e7 }}% additional attack speed for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Active: Azir summons a Sand Soldier for {{ e1 }} seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks in his stead, stabbing the target for {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Other enemies caught in the soldier's attack take {{ f7 }}% of the stab's damage.

Azir stores up to {{ maxammo }} Sand Soldiers and prepares a new one every {{ f1 }} seconds.

Sand Soldiers that strike the same targets deal {{ e9 }}% damage after the first.
Sand Soldiers can attack targets outside of Azir's basic attack range.
Sand Soldiers expire twice as fast when near an enemy turret.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3404.name: Shroud of Darkness
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3404.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3404.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3425.name: Masochism
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3425.description: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3425.tooltip:
Passive: When Dr. Mundo suffers magic damage or pays a health cost, his magic resist is increased by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e0 }} seconds, up to a maximum of {{ f3*100 }}%.

Active: Dr. Mundo's next basic attack will headbutt the enemy, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage ({{ e1 }}% of maximum health) at the cost of {{ e2 }} health.

Upon activation, Dr. Mundo gains up to {{ e4 }} attack damage (no less than {{ e5 }}) for {{ e6 }} seconds based on his missing health.

Masochism grants {{ f2 }} attack damage above the minimum for every 1% of missing health ({{ f5 }}).

59f3aff18bf5501e050f326b.name: Tiger Stance
59f3aff18bf5501e050f326b.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f326b.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will perform a Tiger Strike, dealing bonus {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds.

If a target is affected by Tiger Strike, a new application of Tiger Strike will deal the remaining damage instantly.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f330f.name: Piercing Light
59f3aff28bf5501e050f330f.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f330f.tooltip:
Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage.

Piercing Light's cast time decreases slightly as Lucian gains levels.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f340a.name: Lunar Rush
59f3aff28bf5501e050f340a.description: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f340a.tooltip:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ab.name: Time Bomb
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ab.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ab.tooltip:
Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb to a location. The bomb sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it (prioritizes Champions). After {{ e2 }} seconds it detonates, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all surrounding enemies.

Placing two bombs on a unit detonates the first bomb early, stunning all enemies in the blast for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f326f.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
59f3aff18bf5501e050f326f.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f326f.tooltip:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters, granting True Sight of the target. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next {{ e7 }} seconds.

Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage plus {{ e3 }}% of their missing Health (Max: {{ e6 }} Damage vs. Monsters).

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3282.name: Riftwalk
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3282.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3282.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units.

Each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage per stack, stacking up to {{ e6 }} times.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32bf.name: Winds of War
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32bf.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32bf.tooltip:
Galio fires two windblasts that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2*3 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of enemies' maximum Health (max {{ e4 }} vs. monsters) as magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3342.name: Lamb's Respite
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3342.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3342.tooltip:
Lamb blesses the ground underneath her for {{ e2 }} seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy, can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing.

When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for {{ e1 }}.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3240.name: Aria of Perseverance
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3240.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3240.tooltip:
Active: Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to Sona and a nearby allied champion (prioritizes most wounded) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Diminuendo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain a shield that prevents up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage within the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f334c.name: Ebb and Flow
59f3aff28bf5501e050f334c.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f334c.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b9.name: Disdain
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b9.description: Urgot charges in a direction, trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b9.tooltip:
Urgot charges forwards. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them behind him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and stunning them for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Non-champions take the same damage but are knocked aside.

Cannot cross terrain.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c1.name: Jousting
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c1.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can then reactivate this ability to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c1.tooltip:
Kled dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path. Cannot cross walls.

If Jousting hits an enemy champion or large monster, Kled gains {{ e5 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} second and True Sight of the target. He can reactivate this ability within {{ e6 }} seconds to dash back through the same target, dealing the same damage.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3265.name: Captive Audience
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3265.description:
Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3265.tooltip:
Jhin places an invisible Lotus Trap that lasts {{ e5 }} minutes and activates when stepped on, revealing nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

The trap leaves behind a zone that slows enemies inside by {{ e7 }}% and detonates after 2 seconds, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage ({{ e1 }}% damage on subsequent hits and vs. minions and monsters).

Jhin prepares a new trap every {{ f1 }} seconds and can store 2 at once.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion a Lotus Trap will spawn and detonate where they were killed.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3241.name: Song of Celerity
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3241.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3241.tooltip:
Active: Grants Sona {{ f1*100 }}% movement speed [{{ e1 }}% + {{ f2*100 }}% per 100 ability power] for {{ e9 }} seconds (or until damaged) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Tempo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain {{ f3*100 }}% movement speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Sona's personal movement speed increase will always last at least {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f340c.name: Celestial Expansion
59f3aff28bf5501e050f340c.description: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, magnifying their damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f340c.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Star base damage by {{ e2 }}.

Toggle: Aurelion Sol's Stars orbit at his Outer Limit and deal {{ e1 }}% damage, for a total of {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f341e.name: Fury of the Sands
59f3aff28bf5501e050f341e.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f341e.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }} and Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ e4 }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second as magic damage ({{ e5 }} damage max per second), gains an additional {{ e8 }} Armor and Magic Resistance each second, and Siphoning Strike has a {{ e9 }}% reduced cooldown.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3417.name: Noxious Blast
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3417.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3417.tooltip:
Blasts enemies in an area with Noxious Poison. If a champion is hit, Cassiopeia gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed decaying over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Noxious Poison deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b4.name: Burnout
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b4.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b4.tooltip:
Shyvana deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage per second to nearby enemies and gains a bonus {{ e2 }}% movement speed that decays over {{ e7 }} seconds.

While Burnout is active, basic attacks deal {{ effect1amount*0.25 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*0.25 }}) (+{{ charabilitypower2*.25 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and extend its duration by {{ e8 }} second.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

Burnout has a maximum duration of {{ e9 }} seconds.

59f3b02e8bf5501e050f375c.name: Turtle Stance
59f3b02e8bf5501e050f375c.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.
59f3b02e8bf5501e050f375c.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e3 }}% of his maximum health), increasing by 1% for every percent of Udyr's missing health.

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e0.name: Harvesters of Sorrow
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e0.description: Coats an ally in magnetic metal, increasing each unit's movement speed toward one another. While near one another, the metal swirls violently dealing damage per second to enemies.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f325b.name: Death Sentence
59f3aff18bf5501e050f325b.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f325b.tooltip:
Thresh throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting True Sight and stunning the first unit hit, pulling them in for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Reactivating this ability will pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds if it hits an enemy.

59f3b02e8bf5501e050f375e.name: Searing Charge
59f3b02e8bf5501e050f375e.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
59f3b02e8bf5501e050f375e.tooltip:
Ornn charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

If Ornn rams into terrain, the resulting shockwave will deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage and knock up enemies for {{ e6 }} second.

16

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3304.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3304.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3304.tooltip:
Unleashes a barrage of 5 rockets that converge towards the cursor and fan out past it. Rockets deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. Additional rocket hits deal reduced damage:

Champions and Monsters: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage, max {{ e6 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total damage
Minions: 60% of base damage

Rocket hits against champions charge nearby turret beam attacks.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f343e.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
59f3aff28bf5501e050f343e.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f343e.tooltip:
Camille briefly becomes untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for {{ e3 }} seconds. Other nearby enemies are knocked away. Her basic attacks against the trapped enemy deal bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of their current health.

16

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3428.name: Command: Dissonance
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3428.description: Orianna commands the Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3428.tooltip:
Orianna commands her Ball to release an electric pulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The pulse leaves behind an energy field for {{ e4 }} seconds, lowering enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing ally Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. This effect diminishes over time.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f336e.name: Rite of the Arcane
59f3aff28bf5501e050f336e.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f336e.tooltip:
Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining {{ e2 }} Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit.

The root ends after {{ e1 }} seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If no barrages are fired, {{ e7 }}% of the cooldown is refunded.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3286.name: On The Hunt
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3286.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3286.tooltip:
Passive: Sivir gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

Active: Sivir rallies her allies for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting all nearby allies an initial {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed bonus that reduces to {{ e2 }}% after the first {{ e5 }} seconds of On The Hunt elapse.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3442.name: Highlander
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3442.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3442.tooltip:
Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by {{ e5 }}%.

Active: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%, Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%, and grants immunity to slows for {{ e1 }} seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3269.name: Electro Harpoon
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3269.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3269.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3341.name: Mounting Dread
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3341.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3341.tooltip:
Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f2 }}% of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage.

Wolf's attack critically strikes targets for {{ e6 }}% increased damage if they are below {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) health (Increased by Critical Strike Chance).

[Maximum {{ e0 }} vs. monsters]

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f5.name: Excessive Force
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f5.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f5.tooltip:
Causes next basic attack to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and enemies behind it.

Vi charges a new punch every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold 2 charges at once.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c7.name: Noxian Diplomacy
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c7.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c7.tooltip:
Talon leaps to target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If cast from melee range, Talon does not leap but instead critically strikes, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

When Noxian Diplomacy kills a unit, Talon regains {{ f4 }} health and refunds {{ e5 }}% of its cooldown.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3411.name: Grasping Roots
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3411.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3411.tooltip:
Sends forward vines dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting enemies for {{ e5 }} second(s).

Garden of Thorns: If Grasping Roots passes near a seed, a Vine Lasher grows dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. A Vine Lasher has 400 range and lasts {{ f2 }} seconds.

59f3b02f8bf5501e050f3760.name: Piltover Peacemaker
59f3b02f8bf5501e050f3760.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
59f3b02f8bf5501e050f3760.tooltip:
Revs the rifle for {{ e4 }} second to fire a narrow piercing shot dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. After hitting any target, it opens into a wider shot that deals {{ e2 }}% less damage.

Always deals full damage to trap revealed targets.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3320.name: Courage
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3320.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3320.tooltip:
Passive: Killing units permanently grants {{ f2 }} armor and magic resist, up to a maximum of {{ e2 }}. Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Garen steels his courage for {{ e4 }} seconds. For the first {{ e7 }} seconds, he takes {{ e6 }}% less damage and gains {{ e5 }}% Tenacity. For the remaining duration, he takes {{ e3 }}% less damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f0.name: Twilight Shroud
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f0.description: Akali teleports to a nearby location, leaving a cover of smoke at her previous location. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes Invisible and gains Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her. Enemies inside the smoke have their Movement Speed reduced.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f0.tooltip:
Akali teleports to a nearby location, leaving a cover of smoke at her previous location that lasts for {{ e2 }} seconds and slows enemies within its area by {{ e3 }}%.

While inside the shroud Akali gains Invisibility and {{ e6 }}% movement speed. Attacking or using abilities briefly removes Invisibility.

16

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d8.name: Move Quick
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d8.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d8.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for {{ e2 }} seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f328e.name: Whirling Death
59f3aff18bf5501e050f328e.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f328e.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each unit struck.

Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals {{ e4 }}% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum {{ e2 }}%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3418.name: Miasma
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3418.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3418.tooltip:
Cassiopeia spews venom in an arc, leaving toxic clouds for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies in the clouds are continually afflicted with Debilitating Poison, inflicting a decaying {{ e2 }}% slow and grounding them, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities. They also take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second.

Miasma has a minimum cast range.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ba.name: Fear Beyond Death
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ba.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ba.tooltip:
Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first enemy champion hit. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows for {{ e4 }} seconds by up to {{ e3 }}% based on the victim's missing health.

If the victim falls below {{ e2 }}% health while impaled, Urgot may recast this ability, suppressing the victim and dragging them in for execution. Activates automatically if the target is below {{ e2 }}% at the end of the effect.

When Urgot executes a victim, nearby enemies flee in terror for {{ e0 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fe.name: Weaver's Wall
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fe.description: Stone Weaver creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fe.tooltip:
Cast once to create a wall. Recast immediately to ride ahead of the wall. Moving or receiving damage will cause Taliyah to stop.

Weaver's Wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. Deactivate this spell to break the wall early.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d4.name: Battle Roar
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d4.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d4.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and heals Rengar for {{ e2 }}% of the damage he took in the last {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity effect:
Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and removes existing crowd control effects, in addition to its normal effect.

Damage healed from monster attacks is increased by {{ e5 }}%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3336.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3336.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3336.tooltip:
Passive: Deconstructing enemy Champions Researches them for {{ e2 }} seconds. Basic attacks and all abilities refresh Research.

Active: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and slowing units hit by {{ e3 }}%.

Enemies that stay in the beam will periodically gain Organic Deconstruction stacks. Deals True Damage instead of Magic against Researched units.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fd.name: Unraveled Earth
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fd.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fd.tooltip:
Places a field of dash-sensitive traps that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies in the area by {{ f2 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the traps explode, dealing damage again.

Enemies dashing, being pushed, or being pulled through Unraveled Earth will trigger traps, taking {{ f3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage from each trap (maximum 4, each hit after the first deals {{ f4 }}% less damage).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f332f.name: Powerball
59f3aff28bf5501e050f332f.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f332f.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball, gaining up to {{ f2 }}% Movement Speed over {{ e4 }} seconds. On enemy collision, he stops, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Powerball on cooldown.
Powerball is a channeled spell and is subject to interruption by spells that prevent casting.
Casting Powerball cancels Defensive Ball Curl and puts it on cooldown.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e1.name: Triggerseed
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e1.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e1.tooltip:
Ivern shields an ally, absorbing up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. After 2 seconds, the shield bursts dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Can also be cast on Daisy.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fa.name: Keeper's Verdict
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fa.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32fa.tooltip:
First Cast: Poppy channels for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing herself by {{ e7 }}%.

Second Cast: Poppy smashes the ground, emanating a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies around the first champion hit and knocking them a large distance toward their Summoning Platform. The shockwave length and knockback distance increases with channel duration.

Enemies hit with an uncharged Keeper's Verdict will take half the damage and be knocked straight into the air for half the duration. Enemies are untargetable while they are being knocked away.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c0.name: Violent Tendencies
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c0.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c0.tooltip:
Passive: When Kled basic attacks, he frenzies, gaining {{ e2 }}% attack speed for four attacks or {{ e6 }} seconds. Violent Tendencies then goes on cooldown.

The fourth hit deals bonus physical damage equal to {{ e4 }} plus {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum health (maximum {{ e7 }} vs monsters).

59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a4.name: Seastone Trident
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a4.description: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage, increased by how long the bleed was active on his target.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a4.tooltip:
Passive: Fizz's basic attacks bleed his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage over {{ e8 }} seconds.

Active: Fizz's next basic attack deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage. If the target has been bleeding for at least {{ e7 }} seconds, this bonus increases to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

16

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3375.name: Riptide
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3375.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3375.tooltip:
Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take {{ e3 }}% less damage from additional explosions.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f337c.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
59f3aff28bf5501e050f337c.description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f337c.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e5 }} Mana per strike while in Hammer Stance.

Active: Creates an electric aura dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds to nearby enemies.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3399.name: Quickdraw
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3399.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3399.tooltip:
Dashes in a direction, reloading one shell. Graves gains True Grit for 4 seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead.

Basic attack hits lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} seconds. Damage against non-minions also refreshes True Grit.

True Grit grants {{ e5 }} Armor (stacks up to {{ e0 }} times).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3305.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3305.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3305.tooltip:
Hurls a grenade that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast are also stunned for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Hitting a champion fully charges nearby turret beams.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c2.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c2.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c2.tooltip:
Kled charges toward a location, leaving a trail that grants allies increasing movement speed. While charging, Kled gains a shield that increases over time to a maximum of {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and lasts for 2 seconds after the charge ends.

Skaarl rams the first enemy champion encountered, dealing up to {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1*3 }}%) of the target's maximum health as physical damage based on distance traveled.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f327b.name: Reaping Slash
59f3aff18bf5501e050f327b.description: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f327b.tooltip:
Kayn dashes forward to strike nearby enemies. Both dash and strike deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.
Darkin: Deal a percentage of the target's maximum health instead.

Deals {{ e6 }} bonus physical damage to monsters.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3366.name: Glacial Fissure
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3366.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3366.tooltip:
Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies above it by {{ e4 }}%.

Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The first champion hit is knocked up for {{ e5 }} seconds, subsequent enemies are knocked up briefly.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c5.name: Leap
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c5.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33c5.tooltip:
Leaps to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range by 200, and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f335b.name: Gleaming Quill
59f3aff28bf5501e050f335b.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f335b.tooltip:
Flings a magical feather that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the feather hits a champion or epic monster, Rakan restores {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health to himself and nearby allies after {{ e4 }} seconds or when he touches an ally.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3340.name: Wolf's Frenzy
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3340.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3340.tooltip:
Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for {{ e4 }} seconds. Lamb can redirect Wolf to new targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her.

Wolf's attacks deal magic damage equal to {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f3 }}% of the target's current health.

Wolf attacks faster based on Kindred's attack speed. His attacks maim monsters for {{ e7 }}% increased damage and reduce their attack and movement speed by {{ e8 }}% for 2 seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3439.name: Roar of the Slayer
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3439.description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging and slowing all enemies that it passes through.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3439.tooltip:
Sion fires a shockwave, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit, slowing it by {{ e2 }}%, and reducing its Armor by {{ e5 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

If the target is not a champion, it will be knocked back. Enemies that the knocked back unit collides with take {{ e6 }}% bonus damage and are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3378.name: Fox-Fire
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3378.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3378.tooltip:
Releases three fox-fires that lock on to nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take 30% damage from each additional fox-fire beyond the first, for a maximum of {{ f1 }} damage to a single enemy.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f332c.name: Overdrive
59f3aff28bf5501e050f332c.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f332c.tooltip:
Blitzcrank supercharges himself, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decays over the duration.

When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank's Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3273.name: Last Rites
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3273.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3273.tooltip:
Yorick's next basic attack deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and restores {{ f1 }} Health (doubled when below half Health). Last Rites will leave a grave if it kills the target.

When there are three or more graves nearby and Last Rites has been used, Yorick can cast Awakening to raise Mist Walkers from graves.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c9.name: Assassin's Path
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c9.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c9.tooltip:
Talon vaults up to {{ f2 }} units over the nearest structure or terrain in the target direction. The vault's speed is affected by Talon's movement speed.

Talon cannot dash over the same section of terrain more than once every {{ f3 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f333a.name: Ace in the Hole
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333a.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333a.tooltip:
Takes a second to line up the perfect shot on an enemy Champion at up to {{ e2 }} range. The shot deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage, but other enemy Champions can intercept it.

Grants True Sight of the target during the channel.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a1.name: Devastating Charge
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a1.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a1.tooltip:
Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge (knockback distance also scales).

Devastating Charge's remaining duration pauses during Onslaught of Shadows.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3353.name: Starlight's Touch
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3353.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3353.tooltip:
Spends all charges to heal nearby allied champions for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of maximum Health) per charge, up to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) at maximum charges.
Maximum charges: {{ e6 }}

Bravado-empowered attacks grant 1 charge of Starlight's Touch.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3268.name: Scrap Shield
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3268.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3268.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e6 }} second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.
